021import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
022import net.tnemc.core.currency.Currency;
023import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
024import revxrsal.commands.autocomplete.SuggestionProvider;
025import revxrsal.commands.command.CommandActor;
026import revxrsal.commands.node.ExecutionContext;
027import revxrsal.commands.parameter.ParameterType;
028import revxrsal.commands.stream.MutableStringStream;
029
030import java.util.List;
031import java.util.Optional;
032import java.util.stream.Collectors;
033
034/**
035 * CurrencyResolver
036 *
037 * @author creatorfromhell
038 * @since 0.1.2.0
039 */
040public class CurrencyResolver implements ParameterType<CommandActor, Currency> {
041
042  @Override
043  public Currency parse(@NotNull final MutableStringStream input, @NotNull final ExecutionContext<CommandActor> context) {
044
045    final String value = input.readString();
046
047    final Optional<Currency> currency = TNECore.eco().currency().find(value);
048    return currency.orElse(null);
049  }
050
051  @Override
052  public @NotNull SuggestionProvider<@NotNull CommandActor> defaultSuggestions() {
053
054    return (context)->List.copyOf(TNECore.eco().currency().currencies().stream().map(Currency::getIdentifier).collect(Collectors.toList()));
055  }
056}
